Key: M...Mmm... *yawn*... It's morning.

Ah... It's been a while since I woke up
so peacefully.

No one is jumping on top of me, no one is sleeping
next to me, and no one is yelling at me...

No, wait... Maybe that's supposed to be normal.
I shouldn't think about it... It'll only make me
sadder.

Oh, I'm waking up later than usual? Today is...
Oh, that's right, it's the weekend.

Then Kotori and the others aren't up yet. I guess
I can go make breakfast.
Good morning, Shido.

Oh, good morning. Wait... This smell.
It smells good.
(Ohh?! There's food ready on the table.)

(Toast, omelettes... potatoes and sausage. The
salad has a lot of ingredients. It's pretty
well-made.)
You're late, Shido. We've already started.

Mmm! So good! The sausage and potato thing is
truly a great combination. Who came up with this?
...Uh, the Germans, maybe?
Oh, really?! Then the Germans are amazing!

Let's be sure to praise Arusu-san for making it!
This is amazing.
Yeah, you did very well! Good job, Arusu!
Thank... you.
Mm! I want more!
Yes. Understood. I will bring some over.

Everyone's gathered from the morning.
Tohka, Miku and—

Hehehe... I heeded the summon of the bell. It's
not so bad, surrounding yourself with people to
eat with from time to time.

Concur. We received a phone call saying they made a
lot and needed people to eat it. It's our day off,
so there was no reason for us to say no.
Wait... Maria, did you call them?
It seems like it. I too received an invite.
Maria... You've changed a little.

I agree. She's become a lot more human-like. It's
hard to imagine her like this, knowing the way she
was before.
(The other Arusu" was human-like from the

Operator: get-go... I think. Her expressions and emotions

Key:
(But... yesterday when she erased Tonomachi, that
other Arusu" was laughing. It was an emotion, but

(If that Arusu is the real one, and Maria is a
fake, then would she eventually end up like
that Arusu? But—)
Here you go, Tohka Yatogami. Here is more.

Oh! I was waiting for this! Mm...! What is this?!
There's cheese on top! This is amazing!

I heard this is called cheese toast. It may appear
as pizza toast without any condiments, but it is
said that cheese toast has its benefits as well.

Yes! I understand! The simplicity of the cheese
melted on toast... It's... hard to explain, but...
delicious!
...This salad... is very delicious, too.
It's so colorful and beautiful!

It contains many vitamins and amino acids, and the
balance of minerals is great. It's a very logical
combination.

What? What's more important is that it's
delicious! Despite it being a salad, there's
chicken in it, and I'm so happy!

It's important for protein intake. And if it's
protein that you like, then—

Whoa! I just felt a chill go down my spine!
Origami, I don't know what you're about to
say, but please don't say any more!

Anyways... did you make all of this on your own,
Maria?

Yes. It took me longer to cook than when you made
it. But I made too much in preparation of Tohka
Yatogami's presence. I still lack experience.

No, I think you did a good job.
That's amazing, Maria.
Thank you... Shido.

I just executed the instructions of a recipe. If
you praise me so much... I'll blush.
Good job. You sure did me a favor.
(I put my hand on Maria's head and patted it.)
Oh...
...You patted my head.

(Yeah, what happened on the rooftop yesterday was
bad, but this Arusu—Maria—I'll trust. She's not a
bad girl. She may just have a split personality.)
Hey. Shido! Pat me, too!
Huh? Sure, I guess—

Tohka Yatogami didn't do anything. She just sat
there and ate mindlessly.

On the other hand, I prepared the place settings
and portioned out the food. I assisted more than
she did, so Shido, you should pat me.
Huh...? I-If it's all right... Umm... me, too...
Yoshino helped the most! I would say she was the\nmost cooperative with Arusu-chan. So be sure to\npat her head, too!

Well, I don't mind, but if you all come at me at
once...
How lucky～ Darling, pat me too! Do it a lot!
N-Not fair! Me too...!
Request. Please pat Yuzuru as well.

That sure sounds fun. I would like a pat as well.
Or else I will be really sad. I might cry.

Hey, cut it out! Isn't it obvious that such a
right belongs to the little sister?!

You guys, don't all ask for it at once! Don't
charge at me! Argh! Let me eat my breakfast
in peace!
...Is love to be patted on the head?

Uh, I don't think so... Gosh... you guys are so
loud so early! Just sit down and eat your food!
...I feel like I lost.
Huh? Lost?

I was the one that was patted on the head. But
then I was only one of many.
O-Oh, sorry... They're so noisy.
Shido... You idiot.
Huh?
...Nothing.

(Did she just call me an idiot...? No, I must have
heard wrong.)

(The ruckus doesn't seem to end. Today will be
another crazy day...)
